Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I want to show you an innovative design. I built a ship which, by careful exploitation of KSP bugs, can travel in the entire KSP universe without using any fuel whatsoever.

Given the nature of the ships's engines, I decided to call this vehicle "The Krakenship"!

I'd like to point out that this vehicle requires no mod to work. It is made of stock parts, no cheats, no hacking whatsoever. KSP 0.23.5

Enjoy, and behold the taming of the Kraken!

The first the video of the Kraken Space Program serie is here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yls7gSt4B8s&feature=youtu.be

The .craft file will be made available here once all the episodes of the serie have been completed.

I want to thank all the members of this forum who ventured into the realms of the Kraken propulsion technology for making this ship real!
